claim_summary: Act 776 of 2025, Section 27 appropriates $9,190,880 in federal funds to the Administrative Office of the Courts for the Drug Court Enhancement program, including operating expenses, grants and aid, professional fees, and a $28,640 allocation for the Adult Treatment Court Program【283384439218215†L661-L679】.

source.title: Act 776 of 2025 - Section 27 - Drug Court Enhancement appropriation
